creditline: Gift of Leo and Doris Hodroff
description: painted in Imari iron-red and cobalt blue with pond scene: swan on one bank, mate on opposite bank, flapping its wings, with partridge flying between; spreading base of trellis pattern lappets and deep border on flaring rim above alternating peach and white ground, columnar lappets with gilt; cluster of fish at interior with diaper trellis band below frieze of water birds and birds of flight
title: Wine cistern
